languages.text: Одинокая горная формация целиком состоит из минерала с гладкой зеркальной поверхностью. Минерал не имеет особой ценности для производства, однако само место весьма живописно — купол небес полностью отражается в поверхности плато, в каждой причудливой скале, каменной колонне или арке. В ясные звездные ночи или в лучах северного сияния этот уголок природы особенно красив. Восхищенная команда попросила разрешения прогуляться по удивительному месту.

This lone mountain chain is composed entirely of a mineral with a shiny, mirror-like surface. The mineral itself has no particular value for production, but its properties make this place incredibly beautiful. The sky is brilliantly reflected in the many surfaces of the plateaus, oddly shaped rocks, stone arches, and columns. The view is especially stunning on clear starry nights, or when aurora trails dance in the sky. The enraptured crew have asked the Lord Captain's permission to visit this remarkable place.
languages.original_text: Одинокая горная формация целиком состоит из минерала с гладкой зеркальной поверхностью. Минерал не имеет особой ценности для производства, однако само место весьма живописно — купол небес полностью отражается в поверхности плато, в каждой причудливой скале, каменной колонне или арке. В ясные звездные ночи или в лучах северного сияния этот уголок природы особенно красив. Восхищенная команда попросила разрешения прогуляться по удивительному месту.

traits.locale_text: This lonely mountain chain consists entirely out of a mineral with a shiny, mirror-like surface. The mineral itself has no particular value, but its properties make this place incredibly beautiful. The sky is reflected in the many surfaces of oddly-shaped rocks, stone arches, and columns. The view is exceptionally magnificent when aurora borealis shines in the clear night sky. The crew would like to visit this place and asks the Lord Captain to grant them a shore leave.

The crew would like to visit this place and asks the Lord Captain to grant them a shore leave.

This lone mountain chain is made entirely from a mineral with a shiny, mirror-like surface. The mineral itself has no particular value, but its properties make this place incredibly beautiful. The sky is brilliantly reflected in the many surfaces of oddly-shaped rocks, stone arches, and columns. The view is exceptionally magnificent when auroras trails dance in the stary night sky. The crew would like to visit this remarkable place and asks the Lord Captain to grant them a shore leave.

languages.text: 这条孤独的山脉完全由单一的矿物质组成，表面光洁如镜。这种矿物本身并没有特别的工业价值，但它独特的特性却让这个地方恍如仙境。灿烂的星光洒在高原，落在奇形怪状的岩石上，在石拱门与柱子表面反射，将一切都映照得绚烂夺目。在无云的夜空下，或是当极光的轨迹在天空中舞动时，这里的景色会变得尤为迷人。船员们欣喜若狂，纷纷请求舰长大人允许他们参观这个非比寻常的仙境。
languages.original_text: This lone mountain chain is composed entirely of a mineral with a shiny, mirror-like surface. The mineral itself has no particular value for production, but its properties make this place incredibly beautiful. The sky is brilliantly reflected in the many surfaces of the plateaus, oddly shaped rocks, stone arches, and columns. The view is especially stunning on clear starry nights, or when aurora trails dance in the sky. The enraptured crew have asked the Lord Captain's permission to visit this remarkable place.

traits.locale_text: 这条孤独的山脉完全由单一的矿物质组成，表面光洁如镜。这种矿物本身并没有特别的工业价值，但它独特的特性却让这个地方恍如仙境。灿烂的星光洒在高原，落在奇形怪状的岩石上，在石拱门与柱子表面反射，将一切都映照得绚烂夺目。在无云的夜空下，或是当极光的轨迹在天空中舞动时，这里的景色会变得尤为迷人。船员们欣喜若狂，纷纷请求舰长大人允许他们参观这个非比寻常的仙境。

languages.text: Esta cordillera solitaria está compuesta exclusivamente de un mineral con una superficie brillante y reflectante. El mineral en sí mismo carece de valor productivo, pero sus propiedades otorgan una belleza impresionante a la zona. El cielo se refleja en una multitud de superficies por las mesetas, rocas de formas extrañas, arcos de piedra y columnas. El paisaje es particularmente espectacular en las noches despejadas y cuando las auroras bailan en el cielo. La tripulación, maravillada, solicita permiso a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán para visitar este lugar tan fascinante.
languages.original_text: This lone mountain chain is composed entirely of a mineral with a shiny, mirror-like surface. The mineral itself has no particular value for production, but its properties make this place incredibly beautiful. The sky is brilliantly reflected in the many surfaces of the plateaus, oddly shaped rocks, stone arches, and columns. traits.locale_text: Esta cordillera solitaria está compuesta exclusivamente de un mineral con una superficie brillante y reflectante. El mineral en sí mismo carece de valor productivo, pero sus propiedades otorgan una belleza impresionante a la zona. El cielo se refleja en una multitud de superficies por las mesetas, rocas de formas extrañas, arcos de piedra y columnas. El paisaje es particularmente espectacular en las noches despejadas y cuando las auroras bailan en el cielo. La tripulación, maravillada, solicita permiso a{l| la} Lord Capitán para visitar este lugar tan fascinante.

languages.text: この孤高の山々は、鏡のように輝く鉱物の塊だけでできている。鉱物そのものには特に生産上の価値はないが、この地の並外れた美しさはその輝きによるものが大きい。高原や奇岩、石のアーチや柱などの全面に、大空が鮮やかに映し出される。特に、晴れた星空の夜や、オーロラの軌跡が空に舞うような景色は圧巻だ。クルーたちは虜になり、ロード・キャプテンの許可を得て、この素晴らしい場所を訪れている。
languages.original_text: This lone mountain chain is composed entirely of a mineral with a shiny, mirror-like surface. The mineral itself has no particular value for production, but its properties make this place incredibly beautiful. The sky is brilliantly reflected in the many surfaces of the plateaus, oddly shaped rocks, stone arches, and columns. languages.text: Diese einsame Gebirgskette besteht vollständig aus einem Mineral mit einer glänzenden, spiegelähnlichen Oberfläche. Das Mineral selbst hat keinen besonderen industriellen Wert, es macht diese Welt aber atemberaubend schön. Der Himmel spiegelt sich in den vielen Oberflächen des Plateaus, der merkwürdig geformten Felsen, Steinbögen und Säulen. In sternenklaren Nächten ist der Anblick besonders atemberaubend, oder wenn Auroraspuren am Himmel tanzen. Die entzückte Crew hat den Lord Captain gebeten, diesen besonderen Ort besuchen zu dürfen.

languages.text: Cette chaîne de montagnes solitaire est totalement composée d'un minerai à la fois étincelant et réfléchissant. Le minerai en lui-même n'a que peu d'intérêt industriel, mais ses propriétés rendent cet endroit magnifique. Le ciel se reflète sur le plateau, les étranges rochers, les arches de pierre et les colonnes, formant ainsi un panorama d'exception. La vue est particulièrement belle lors des nuits étoilées ou lorsque l'aurore perce les cieux. L'équipage, fasciné, a demandé {mf|au|à la} seigneur-capitaine la permission d'aller visiter cet endroit incroyable.
languages.original_text: This lone mountain chain is composed entirely of a mineral with a shiny, mirror-like surface. languages.text: Bu yalnız dağ zinciri; parlak, ayna benzeri bir yüzeye sahip bir mineralden oluşuyor. Mineralin kendisinin özel bir üretim değeri olmasa da özellikleri, burayı inanılmaz güzelleştiriyor. Gökyüzü; yaylaların, garip şekilli kayaların, taş kemerlerin ve sütunların birçok yüzeyinde parıltıyla yansıyor. Manzara, özellikle yıldızlı gecelerde veya kutup ışıklarının gökte dans ettiği zamanlarda çarpıcı bir hâl alıyor. Mest olan mürettebat, bu olağanüstü yeri ziyaret etmek için Lord Kaptan'dan izin istiyor.
